column11: x #Written by lil ol me *insert girl tongue squirming* also someone did a lot of edits mostly language and typo stuff

column2: Your patron God is concentrating on its domain, and is not currently taking much notice of events in the mortal realm or its followers. Only keen on resisting and battling the other Chaos Gods in constant fight for dominance. At least the mortal realm is safe from this gods incursion, for now...
Less boons and less favour received.
The mortal realm is ripe for invasion, begging to be conquered. Your patron God gathers its power and influence to bring havoc to the mortal realm. What will happen to the world now?
More boons and more favour received.
Your patron God is delegating its resources and powers into both the Realm of Chaos and the Mortal Realm.
No change to boon and favour received

These are the End Times, the realm of Chaos is merging with the mortal realm. These are dark times, mountains shake, seas and rivers flow with blood, decay sows the fields, and daemonic invasions of are a constant threat. This truly are the end times!
Extra increase in boons and favour received.
The Blood God's daemon armies are invading your patron God's domain. Legions upon legions of blood thirsty monsters march, seeking to weaken your God!
Grandfather Nurgle's daemon armies are invading your patron God's domain. Legions upon legions of decaying and plagued monsters march, seeking to weaken your God!
The Dark Prince's daemon armies are invading your patron God's domain. Legions upon legions of beautiful and excessive like monsters march, seeking to weaken your God!
The Changer of Ways daemon armies are invading your patron God's domain. Legions upon legions of mutated and magical monsters march, seeking to weaken your God!

Your patron God has grew in power, shadowing the other chaos gods. Its power is growing, influences spreading, daemon numbers bolstering. Tt is only matter of time when will the chaotic tide be unleashed and sweep everything in its way.
This Chaos God is currently Ascendent.

There is always an eerie calm before the storm. With the chaos realm it is no different. It is stable now, as much as it can be for such an evershifting place. Your patron Gods domain rests, but for how long will it stay this way?
